actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Reported to House by House Committee on Rules. Report No: 97-847.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House (Amended) by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to establish a Select Committee on Children, Youth and Families.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Establishes in the House of Representatives the Select Committee on Children, Youth, and Families to conduct a comprehensive study of their problems and to develop policies to coordinate governmental and private programs to address such problems. Provides that the committee shall not have legislative jurisdiction. Requires the Committee to report to the House as soon as practicable during the present Congress on the results of its study.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to establish a Select Committee on Children, Youth and Families.
